description:
When Laura`s parents find out that she failed to pass a test at school, they punish her by not buying a CD player she`s been wanting. Out of anger, she runs away from home. Really worried, the Ham-Hams try to find Laura in the city. Laura ends up meeting Maria and accompanying her to a piano concert. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: とっとこホント! 迷子のロコちゃん
